typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Reservation Number} as string,
		{Reservation Item} as string,
		{User name} as string,
		{Movement Type} as string,
		{Requirement Date} as string,
		{Account Doc Creation Date} as string,
		{Material Document} as string,
		{Order Number} as string,
		Material as string,
		{Unit Of Measure} as string,
		Quantity as decimal(13,3),
		{Goods Recipient} as string,
		{Material Desc} as string,
		{Document Date} as string,
		{Document User} as string,
		Department as string,
		Plant as string,
		{Full name of Person} as string,
		{TO Doc} as string,
		{TO Date} as string,
		{No Days} as integer,
		{MR Qty} as decimal(13,3),
		{Final Issued Qty} as decimal(13,3),
		{SOH Batch} as decimal(13,3),
		{Delivery in Full} as string,
		{Delivery ontime} as string,
		DIFOT as string,
		{Cost Center} as string,
		{Item deleted} as string,
		{Mvt allowed} as string,
		SLoc as string,
		Batch as string,
		{Order type} as string,
		{Created Date} as string,
		{User status} as string,
		Release as string,
		{Release date} as string,
		{Unblock date} as string,
		{Moving Freq} as string,
		{SOH SLoc} as decimal(13,3),
		{Consignment Stock} as decimal(13,3),
		{MRP Controller} as string,
		MCAB as decimal(13,3),
		{SOH Plant} as decimal(13,3),
		{SOH Company} as decimal(13,3),
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		CREATED_TIME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 filter(CREATED_DATE < '20190925') ~> Filter1
Filter1 alterRow(upsertIf(CREATED_DATE<'20190925')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		{Reservation Number} as string,
		{Reservation Item} as string,
		{User name} as string,
		{Movement Type} as string,
		{Requirement Date} as string,
		{Account Doc Creation Date} as string,
		{Material Document} as string,
		{Order Number} as string,
		Material as string,
		{Unit Of Measure} as string,
		Quantity as decimal(13,3),
		{Goods Recipient} as string,
		{Material Desc} as string,
		{Document Date} as string,
		{Document User} as string,
		Department as string,
		Plant as string,
		{Full name of Person} as string,
		{TO Doc} as string,
		{TO Date} as string,
		{No Days} as integer,
		{MR Qty} as decimal(13,3),
		{Final Issued Qty} as decimal(13,3),
		{SOH Batch} as decimal(13,3),
		{Delivery in Full} as string,
		{Delivery ontime} as string,
		DIFOT as string,
		{Cost Center} as string,
		{Item deleted} as string,
		{Mvt allowed} as string,
		SLoc as string,
		Batch as string,
		{Order type} as string,
		{Created Date} as string,
		{User status} as string,
		Release as string,
		{Release date} as string,
		{Unblock date} as string,
		{Moving Freq} as string,
		{SOH SLoc} as decimal(13,3),
		{Consignment Stock} as decimal(13,3),
		{MRP Controller} as string,
		MCAB as decimal(13,3),
		{SOH Plant} as decimal(13,3),
		{SOH Company} as decimal(13,3),
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		CREATED_TIME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['{Reservation Number}','{Reservation Item}'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Reservation Number},
		{Reservation Item},
		{User name},
		{Movement Type},
		{Requirement Date},
		{Account Doc Creation Date},
		{Material Document},
		{Order Number},
		Material,
		{Unit Of Measure},
		Quantity,
		{Goods Recipient},
		{Material Desc},
		{Document Date},
		{Document User},
		Department,
		Plant,
		{Full name of Person},
		{TO Doc},
		{TO Date},
		{No Days},
		{MR Qty},
		{Final Issued Qty},
		{SOH Batch},
		{Delivery in Full},
		{Delivery ontime},
		DIFOT,
		{Cost Center},
		{Item deleted},
		{Mvt allowed},
		SLoc,
		Batch,
		{Order type},
		{Created Date},
		{User status},
		Release,
		{Release date},
		{Unblock date},
		{Moving Freq},
		{SOH SLoc},
		{Consignment Stock},
		{MRP Controller},
		MCAB,
		{SOH Plant},
		{SOH Company},
		CREATED_DATE,
		CREATED_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionRootPath: 'restapi/blob/bot_file.json',
	wildcardPaths:['blob/bot_file.json']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
